courseDetails.title: Coding Basics: Gentle Intro to Computer Programming
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to code and start your career in programming. Build your Dev Career and increase your opportunities in the future!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hi, welcome to the Coding Basics: Gentle Intro to Computer Programming Course.


Why this course?

Learning to code provides you with a lot of opportunities, jobs and ways to make money, as the software industry is a vast field that has no boundaries.

Also, in today’s job market, employers are constantly looking for employees with coding skills.

And if you want to work as a freelancer who has his time and earns a lot of money, then the software field gives you many opportunities to achieve this and with a very high income.
Since programming is a highly valued skill right now, many companies are willing to outsource the work.
This means that skilled programmers and developers have the ability to create their own schedule.

There are many advantages that you will get if you learn to code, including:

  • Coding can allow you to pursue passion projects.

  • Coding can boost problem solving and logic skills.

  • Coding improves interpersonal skills.

  • Being a skilled coder can build confidence.

  • Coding teaches critical thinking, creativity and resilience.

  • Coding is an essential skill in the future because it is an important part of the digital transformation. The number of jobs that require coding skills will grow exponentially because most services and products are being digitized.

  • All these features and more.


If you want to get started in this field and learn coding from scratch, this course is for you and will help you take the first step towards success in this field.


  • Take the first step towards success in Coding

  • Write your first Program

  • Code with Confidence and Logical thinking

  • Apply Coding to perform various tasks

  • Variables, Data Types, Data Structures, Flow Control, Iterations, Functional Programming, and More

  • Learn to code fast and improve reusability, scalability and efficiency

  • Coding Essentials to get future jobs

  • How to put all the components together to construct real Program

  • Build Customer Data Collector Program


In this course, you will learn to practice programming with confidence and logical thinking. You will also learn the basics of programming that are common in different programming languages and how to apply them to perform various tasks.


  • Video Training Course.

  • Lifetime Access.

  • Certificate of completion to upload on your profile to boost your career.

So, what are you waiting for, let's get started.
targetAudiences: Coding Beginners
Programming Beginners
Entry-Level Programmers
This course is for you if you are newbie to Coding, and curious about learning and practicing Coding.
Anyone who wants to enjoy Coding and boost his career.

courseDetails.title: Mastering Active Directory:  Manage and Optimize The Network
courseDetails.shortDescription: Gain Essential Active Directory Skills for Windows Network Management
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering Active Directory: Manage and Optimize the Network is an essential course for IT professionals responsible for managing, administering, and maintaining Windows-based networks. Active Directory is a vital component of network management, and this course provides a comprehensive overview of the features and capabilities of Active Directory, from installation and configuration to troubleshooting common issues.


In this course, you will learn how to manage Active Directory objects such as users, groups, and computers, configure and manage Group Policy, and manage Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS), You will also gain valuable skills in Active Directory security, troubleshooting, and best practices for efficient and effective network management.


Through a combination of lectures, demonstrations, and hands-on lab exercises, you will gain practical experience working with Active Directory, and learn how to optimize your network for high performance, reliability, and security. Whether you are new to Active Directory or looking to deepen your knowledge and skills, this course is an essential resource for IT professionals seeking to master Active Directory and advance their careers in network management.


Overall, this course is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of Active Directory and its key features and equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to effectively manage and optimize their Windows-based networks.


Testimonials:


"this is super great " : Aboyomi Segun Opoola


" Excellent Presentation " Daniel W Koffie-Ocloo
targetAudiences: An Active Directory course is typically designed for IT professionals who are responsible for managing, administering, and maintaining Windows-based networks. This may include system administrators, network engineers, IT managers, security professionals, and helpdesk/support staff. These individuals may have varying levels of experience with Active Directory, ranging from beginners to advanced users.

courseDetails.title: AI applied for business
courseDetails.shortDescription: Enabling business cases for value creation
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is intended for managers, product owners, and business analysts, without any prior technical expertise, willing to leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) in real business applications.


The main goal is to enable you to identify and suggest business opportunities applying AI/ML.


In this course, you will go through:


  • Key aspects of AI/ML


This will be done in a light format, intended for non-technical people.

There are NO math/programming/statistics/technical background requirements.

With this knowledge, you will be able to better understand the inner workings of AI, its purpose, and the circumstances in which it is best suited.


  • Business case discovery


In this module, the requirements and objectives of an AI model will be covered, alongside examples and a guideline.

This knowledge will guide you in identifying cases where AI can be leveraged to create value.


  • Project roadmap creation


AI/ML projects involve a very specific staged development with unique steps that make up the process. Those are both cyclical and incremental, due to the trial-and-error nature of the project.

Those unique characteristics demand a more specific analysis than standard software development, with several factors to consider, both technical and business-related.

Factoring into the planning those components protect the project against disruptions, unexpected hurdles, challenges, and potential failure.


  • Project management


In this module major stages, steps, and considerations are covered.


Learning the most important aspects of an AI project, and how its development is done is crucial.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In this course, you are not intended to learn how to create a model or any other technical data-related task.

Please check Udemy Terms of Use for refund policy and other related subjects.
targetAudiences: Managers, product owners, and business analysts, without a technical background, willing to leverage AI/ML in real business applications.

courseDetails.title: Mini MBA in Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mini MBA by MTF Institute, Major: Entrepreneurship & Innovations + Management, Leadership, Marketing, Finance, Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Mini MBA in Entrepreneurship by MTF Institute


Program provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on higher & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 203 countries and has been chosen by more than 180,000 students.


Program Modules:

Module 1: General Management

Module 2: Leadership

Module 3: Marketing Management

Module 4: Finance Management

Module 5: Business Strategy

Module 6: Innovations (The Main Concentration)

Module 7: Entrepreneurship (The Main Concentration)


The Mini MBA in Entrepreneurship is a valuable program that offers numerous benefits for both companies and managers. It equips individuals with the knowledge, skills, and mindset required to succeed in the dynamic world of entrepreneurship and business management. Here's why learning entrepreneurship through the Mini MBA program is important for companies, managers, and individuals looking to build their careers or run successful businesses:


1. Innovation and Creativity: Entrepreneurship programs encourage creative thinking and innovative problem-solving. Managers who have learned entrepreneurship are better equipped to develop unique solutions, identify opportunities for growth, and drive innovation within their organizations.


2. Risk Management: Entrepreneurs and managers must navigate various risks and uncertainties in the business world. The Mini MBA in Entrepreneurship teaches individuals how to assess, mitigate, and manage risks effectively, which is essential for both startups and established companies seeking to expand or adapt to changing market conditions.


3. Business Development: Entrepreneurs and managers often play a pivotal role in expanding a company's reach and influence. Learning entrepreneurship helps individuals understand market dynamics, customer behavior, and the strategies needed to drive business development, whether it's launching new products, entering new markets, or forming strategic partnerships.


4. Financial Acumen: Finance is a crucial aspect of business management. Mini MBA programs in Entrepreneurship provide a solid foundation in financial management, helping managers make informed decisions related to budgeting, investment, and resource allocation, which is vital for business sustainability and growth.


5. Leadership and Team Management: Successful entrepreneurship relies on effective leadership and teamwork. Entrepreneurs and managers with the Mini MBA in Entrepreneurship learn how to lead diverse teams, inspire employees, and create a positive work culture, enhancing employee productivity and company performance.


6. Strategic Planning: Entrepreneurs and managers must develop and execute effective business strategies to achieve long-term success. Mini MBA programs emphasize strategic planning, helping individuals create clear roadmaps for their companies' future growth and sustainability.


7. Networking: Building a robust professional network is essential for entrepreneurs and managers. Mini MBA programs often provide opportunities to connect with industry experts, alumni, and fellow students, facilitating valuable networking that can lead to partnerships, mentorship, and business opportunities.


8. Adaptability: The business landscape is constantly evolving. Learning entrepreneurship equips individuals with the adaptability and agility needed to respond to changes, seize emerging opportunities, and stay competitive in an ever-changing market.


9. Entrepreneurial Mindset: Even within established organizations, cultivating an entrepreneurial mindset can drive innovation and growth. Mini MBA programs instill this mindset, encouraging managers to think like entrepreneurs, take initiative, and continuously seek opportunities for improvement.


10. Career Advancement: For individuals looking to advance their careers, the Mini MBA in Entrepreneurship can open doors to leadership positions, executive roles, or the opportunity to start their own businesses. It provides a versatile skill set that is highly sought after by employers across various industries.


In conclusion, the Mini MBA in Entrepreneurship is not only beneficial for aspiring entrepreneurs but also for managers within companies of all sizes. It fosters a range of skills and attributes that are essential for success in today's competitive business landscape. Whether you're looking to build a successful career, run a business, or enhance your company's performance, entrepreneurship education is a valuable investment that can yield substantial returns.


Mini MBA programs have gained significant popularity in recent years as a valuable educational option for both employers and experts seeking to enhance their careers or start their own businesses. These condensed, focused programs offer a taste of traditional MBA coursework without the time and financial commitments required by full-length MBA programs. Here's why Mini MBA programs are important for building careers and businesses:

1. Skill Enhancement: Mini MBA programs provide participants with a comprehensive understanding of key business principles, such as finance, marketing, strategy, and leadership. This knowledge equips individuals with the skills necessary to excel in their current roles or transition into new ones. Employers can benefit from employees who possess a broader skill set and can contribute more effectively to the organization's success.

2. Cost-Effective: Mini MBA programs are typically more affordable than full-length MBA programs, making them accessible to a wider range of professionals. This affordability allows individuals to invest in their education without incurring substantial debt, making it a viable option for those looking to advance their careers or start their own businesses.

3. Time Efficiency: Many professionals cannot commit to the two-year duration of a traditional MBA program due to work and personal commitments. Mini MBA programs are designed to be completed in a shorter time frame, often a few months, making it possible for individuals to balance their education with their existing responsibilities.

4. Networking Opportunities: Mini MBA programs often bring together a diverse group of professionals from various industries and backgrounds. This diversity fosters valuable networking opportunities, enabling participants to connect with peers, instructors, and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new career opportunities and potential business collaborations.

5. Entrepreneurial Skill Development: Mini MBA programs are particularly beneficial for aspiring entrepreneurs. They offer insights into business planning, finance, marketing, and strategy – all critical aspects of launching and running a successful business. Entrepreneurs can use the knowledge gained from a Mini MBA program to make informed decisions and navigate the complexities of entrepreneurship.

6. Adaptability and Continuous Learning: In today's rapidly changing business landscape, adaptability and continuous learning are essential. Mini MBA programs provide participants with up-to-date knowledge and skills that can help them stay relevant and competitive in their careers. Employers value employees who are committed to ongoing learning and development.

7. Career Advancement: For employees looking to advance within their organizations, a Mini MBA can be a valuable asset. It demonstrates a commitment to professional growth and can make individuals more competitive for promotions and leadership positions.

8. Confidence Building: Mini MBA programs can boost the confidence of both employees and aspiring entrepreneurs. Knowing that you have a solid foundation in business concepts and strategies can empower you to take on new challenges and seize opportunities.

Mini MBA programs offer a cost-effective, time-efficient, and comprehensive way for both employers and experts to enhance their skills, advance their careers, and build successful businesses. Whether you are seeking career growth within an organization or aiming to launch your own venture, a Mini MBA program can provide the knowledge and confidence needed to achieve your goals in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Adeus Windows! Curso Completo de Linux Desktop —Iniciantes—
courseDetails.shortDescription: Sobre: Segurança, Performance, FHS, Principais Comandos, ufw Firewall, Oracle VirtualBox, Flatpak, Estilizar o Linux =)
courseDetails.longDescription:
O que é Linux?

Assim como o Windows, iOS e MacOS, o Linux é um sistema operacional. De fato, uma das plataformas mais populares do planeta, por exemplo, o Android é um sistema operacional Linux usado em celulares, mas também há versões para desktop (ensinada neste curso), servidores e outros dispositivos. Atualmente (2023) são mais de 600 opções de Linux que você pode escolher.

Por que devo aprender Linux?

Diferentemente do Windows, você não precisa ter um PC caro para rodar novas versões Linux, um computador com menos de 1GB de RAM pode rodar satisfatoriamente um navegador de internet e uma planilha compatível com Excel, por exemplo. A grande questão é que os bons sistemas Linux são rápidos, seguros e gratuitos!

Quem usa o Linux?

  • 47% dos desenvolvedores profissionais usam sistemas operacionais baseados em Linux. (Statista)

  • O Linux alimenta 39,2% dos sites cujo sistema operacional é conhecido. (W3Techs)

  • O Linux alimenta 85% dos smartphones. (Hayden James)

  • Linux é o terceiro sistema operacional de desktop mais popular, dentre eles, é o único totalmente gratuito. (Statista)

  • Os 500 supercomputadores mais rápidos do mundo são executados no Linux, pois são mais confiáveis. (Blackdown)

  • 96,3% dos servidores que custam mais de US$ 1.000.000,00 (um milhão de dólares) estão executando Linux. (ZDNet)

O que aprenderei nesse curso?

Este curso foi criado para que usuários de Windows possam migrar para Linux. Para isso, será usado um processo (passo a passo) que facilitará sua adaptação no Linux, mesmo sem conhecimentos avançados no novo sistema operacional.

O que este curso tem de diferente dos demais?

Este não é apenas um curso de “como usar Linux”, é um processo estruturado de forma que você vai se adaptar ao novo sistema. Este treinamento foi desenhado para você usar o Linux no seu dia a dia, aproveitar os benefícios da tecnologia, mas sem exigir que você domine completamente os comandos Linux, pois permite uma adaptação gradual ao novo sistema.

Obs.: Usuários que já tentaram usar Linux, se frustraram e acabaram voltando para Windows, fiquem tranquilos, dessa vez você vai conseguir! =)

Como são as aulas?

O treinamento é composto por 80% de aulas práticas, passo a passo. As aulas teóricas representam 20% do curso, onde são explicados conceitos importantes para novos usuários de Linux.

Este curso me tornará um administrador de Linux?

Não. Este curso tem foco no usuário Desktop e não na formação de um administrador Linux, mas é um caminho inicial ideal para quem deseja tornar futuramente. Um administrador Linux precisa de um grande conhecimento sobre serviços, protocolos de rede, gerenciamento diversos tipos de acessos, entre outras operações avançadas, estas tarefas não são o foco deste treinamento.

O que é um terminal Linux? Vou aprender a usar?

Terminal (ou shell) é um software onde você digita comandos para executar as tarefas sem precisar usar mouse, botões e janelas. Sendo um curso de Linux, obviamente, será ensinado sobre a Estrutura de Arquivos Linux (FHS) e, execução de comandos essenciais no terminal.

Como é a interface gráfica do Linux usado neste curso?

Usaremos o Linux Ubuntu, que é uma das distribuições Linux mais estáveis e confiáveis do universo Linux, o Ubuntu possui imensa quantidade de recursos operacionais gráficos, que permite a um usuário de Windows se adaptar com facilidade ao novo sistema.

Vou aprender coisas avançadas neste curso?

Neste treinamento você também vai entender e praticar assuntos avançados como Virtualização em Linux, aprendendo o conceito, instalação e configuração de máquinas virtuais no Linux Ubuntu, utilizaremos o poderoso Oracle VirtualBox neste processo.

O que preciso saber antes de fazer este curso?

Estar habituado ao uso de Windows ou outro sistema operacional como macOS já é o bastante.

Quem é o professor?

Prof. Arnaldo Sousa, formado em Engenharia de Software e apaixonado pesquisas tecnológicas. Foi instrutor oficial IBM e Sun Microsystem (criadora do Java, atual Oracle), é professor licenciado, especializado em docência, neuroaprendizagem e educação especial. Com larga experiência de uso e ensino de novas tecnologias em grandes corporações, o professor vai lhe apresentar o Linux de uma forma extremamente compreensível!
targetAudiences: Iniciantes em Linux;
Usuários de Windows ou macOS;
Aqueles que desejam facilidade de uso, segurança e performance Linux, mas não querem aprofundar-se nos comandos de terminal;
Pessoas que gostariam de migrar de Windows para Linux mas tem medo de não conseguir;
Aqueles que desejam usar o Linux como Desktop/Workstation;
Pessoas que já tentaram e não conseguiram usar o Linux como sistema operacional no dia a dia.

instructors.name: Arnaldo Sousa - IBM Former Instructor | Linux | CKA | CKAD | Helm | Desenvolvimento web | Terraform | Istio

courseDetails.longDescription:
¡Te doy la bienvenida a este completo curso de SQLite con Python! Si deseas aprender a trabajar con bases de datos de manera eficiente, este curso es perfecto para ti. Aquí descubrirás cómo utilizar SQLite, una base de datos ligera y de alto rendimiento, perfectamente integrada con Python.

A lo largo del curso, te guiaré en cada paso del proceso para que puedas crear, conectar y administrar bases de datos SQLite. Aprenderás a realizar consultas SQL para obtener, modificar y eliminar datos, y explorarás técnicas avanzadas para trabajar con datos de manera efectiva.

SQLite es una excelente opción para aplicaciones de tamaño mediano y proyectos donde la simplicidad y eficiencia son fundamentales. Con mi instrucción, te convertirás en un experto en el manejo de bases de datos SQLite y estarás preparado para enfrentar cualquier desafío en tu camino hacia el desarrollo de software.

Lo más importante, quiero que sepas que siempre estaré disponible para responder tus preguntas y brindarte la ayuda que necesites. Tu éxito en este curso es mi prioridad.

Además, al finalizar el curso, te invito a continuar tu formación en SQLite y Python a través de mi canal @josecodetech. Allí encontrarás contenido adicional, consejos y emocionantes proyectos que te ayudarán a seguir desarrollando tus habilidades como programador y a llevar tus proyectos a un nivel superior.

No pierdas esta oportunidad de ser un maestro en SQLite y llevar tus habilidades de programación al siguiente nivel. ¡Comencemos este emocionante recorrido juntos y conviértete en un experto en el manejo de bases de datos con Python!

Nota: si algun enlace del curso no funciona, cambia "ticoticotaa" por "josecodetech".
targetAudiences: Este curso está diseñado para aquellos que desean aprender a trabajar con bases de datos en Python utilizando SQLite. Se recomienda tener conocimientos básicos de programación en Python, incluyendo variables, funciones y estructuras de control. Además, es útil tener experiencia en el manejo de archivos y directorios en un sistema operativo, ya que se trabajará con bases de datos y se realizarán operaciones de lectura y escritura en archivos. Si deseas dominar el manejo de bases de datos con Python y aprender a realizar consultas avanzadas, este curso es ideal para ti.

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress Para Principiantes
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web desde cero con WordPress, de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿QUIERES CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS PARA AUMENTAR LAS VENTAS DE TU NEGOCIO?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web en WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestro sitio web en WordPress, utilizando los temas y plantillas que nos brinda el constructor visual, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web en WordPress, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress y Elementor desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu sitio web de WordPress.

  • Cómo adaptar tu sitio web de WordPress para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).

courseDetails.title: Crea Correos Corporativos con Dominio Propio en Gmail 2023
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a como crear correos corporativos con dominio propio en Gmail, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿CUÁLES SON LAS VENTAJAS DE TENER CORREOS CORPORATIVOS PARA TU NEGOCIO?


Mejor imagen corporativa: Es la primera ventaja que surge de contar con un dominio propio. Le aporta seriedad, confianza y autoridad a tu marca ante tus clientes y proveedores.


De este modo, el dominio te ayuda a mostrar una imagen que refleje compromiso y confianza, y además es una forma de permitir que los usuarios identifiquen fácilmente tu negocio online.


Y es que no genera mucha confianza una empresa cuyo correo electrónico sea una cuenta de Gmail o de Outlook (Hotmail).


Contactar a ventas@tumarca(.)com es más serio que escribir a ventas.tumarca@gmail(.)com. Así se generará la sensación de que tu marca no cuida suficientemente los detalles.


Comunicación más efectiva: Muchos emprendedores suelen mezclar las soluciones de comunicación efectivas con las que son de carácter gratuito.


Con esto nos referimos a que elegir una cuenta de correo electrónico gratuito significa quedar atado a ciertas características indeseables. Imaginemos que le enviamos una propuesta interesante a uno de nuestros mejores clientes. Es posible que, ese email termine perdido en la bandeja de Spam, por lo que se aumentan las probabilidades de que nunca sea abierto.


Un gran porcentaje de cuentas gratuitas se utiliza para hacer spam y tus mail pueden ser catalogados de la misma manera si son de cuentas gratuitas. Es un riesgo que no vale nada la pena.


Así pues, contar con un dominio propio hará que tus clientes reciban con seguridad todos tus emails con promociones e información que podría interesarles en su bandeja de entrada principal, por lo que no perderás ninguna oportunidad.


Mejor gestión de información y comunicación: Una de las mejores ventajas de contar con un dominio para los correos electrónicos de tu empresa, es que este te permite crear listas o grupos de trabajo. De este modo, tus colaboradores podrán comunicarse de una manera más sencilla y profesional, al mismo tiempo que aumentan el rendimiento del trabajo en equipo.


Garantiza tu privacidad: sino lo sabías, al crear una cuenta de email en una empresa como Google, debes aceptar obligatoriamente sus políticas de privacidad. Esto significa que Google tendrá acceso a tu información, por lo que esta será usada para mostrarte publicidad personalizada.


En cambio, con un dominio y servidor propio, tendrás la tranquilidad de mantener los datos y la información de tu empresa en buenas manos, pues tu empresa de hosting te garantiza no compartir esta información con terceros. Así, solo tu tendrás control absoluto de tu información.


Mayor seguridad de tus correos: al momento de gestionar una cuenta de correos esto es muy importante. Casi todos los servicios de correos corporativos tienen mayores medidas y protocolos de seguridad ante el posible hackeo o ataque a través de virus por terceros. Existen antivirus, firewalls y filtros anti-spam muy avanzados para proteger tu información confidencial, tus cuentas, dispositivos y equipos.


EN ESTE CURSO, APRENDERÁS:

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tus correos corporativos con dominio propio.

  • Cómo conectar el dominio a tu plan de hosting para comenzar a crear tus correos corporativos con dominio propio.

  • Cómo crear una cuenta de correo corporativa con dominio propio.

  • Cómo crear una cuenta de correo electrónico en Gmail.

  • Cómo configurar tu correo corporativo con dominio propio en Gmail.


Crea Correos Corporativos con Dominio Propio en Gmail, es el curso más completo que encontrará en Internet, curso que le mostrará todo lo que necesita saber para crear correos corporativos con dominio propio en Gmail, sin tener conocimientos previos, de forma fácil y simple.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a crear aplicaciones web para vender productos físicos y digitales, sin saber de códigos ni programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR APLICACIONES WEB PARA VENDER PRODUCTOS FÍSICOS Y DIGITALES SIN SABER DE PROGRAMACIÓN?


En este curso te voy enseñar a crear aplicaciones web para comercio electrónico usando la plataforma más popular del mundo para esto, llamada WordPress, es una plataforma fácil de usar y muy intuitiva, en él podrás diseñar profesionalmente en un entorno web sin saber de códigos ni de programación.


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una tienda online y una página de ventas en WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar diversas aplicaciones web con WordPress, utilizando los temas y plantillas que nos brinda el constructor visual, que llevarán sus creaciones y diseños web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos diversas aplicaciones web para comercio electrónico con WordPress, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, podrá crear aplicaciones web para comercio electrónico con su personalización y a su gusto.

courseDetails.title: Mini MBA in Innovations and Digital Transformation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mini MBA by MTF Institute, Major: Innovations and Digital + General Management, Leadership, Marketing, Finance, Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Mini MBA by MTF Institute

With Main Concentration in Innovations and Digital Transformation


Program provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on higher & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 203 countries and has been chosen by more than 170,000 students.


Program Modules:

Module 1: General Management

Module 2: Leadership

Module 3: Marketing Management

Module 4: Finance Management

Module 5: Business Strategy

Module 6: Innovations (The Main Concentration)

Module 7: Digital Transformation (The Main Concentration)


Learning programs in Innovation and Digital Transformation are crucial for both companies and experts in today's rapidly evolving business landscape. These programs encompass a range of topics and skills that are essential for staying competitive, adapting to changing market dynamics, and fostering professional growth. Here's why these programs are important for companies and experts alike:


For Companies:

Stay Competitive: In the digital age, innovation is the key to staying competitive. Companies that fail to innovate risk becoming obsolete. Learning programs in innovation and digital transformation provide employees with the knowledge and skills to identify emerging trends, technologies, and business models, allowing their companies to adapt and thrive.


Adapt to Changing Markets: Markets are constantly evolving, and consumer preferences are shifting faster than ever before. Companies need to be agile and responsive to these changes. A workforce well-versed in digital transformation can help organizations pivot and adjust their strategies accordingly.


Efficiency and Cost Savings: Digital transformation often involves automation and process optimization, leading to increased efficiency and cost savings. Employees trained in these areas can identify opportunities to streamline operations, reduce waste, and improve overall productivity.


Customer-Centricity: Digital transformation is often driven by the need to better understand and serve customers. Learning programs in this area can teach employees how to gather and analyze customer data, leading to more personalized and effective marketing, sales, and customer service strategies.


Innovation Culture: Innovation is not limited to R&D departments. It should permeate an organization's culture. Training programs can help employees develop an innovation mindset, encouraging them to proactively seek out opportunities for improvement and innovation.


Risk Management: The digital world is fraught with security and compliance risks. Learning programs in digital transformation can educate employees about cybersecurity best practices, data protection, and regulatory compliance, reducing the organization's exposure to potential risks.


For Experts:

Career Advancement: Professionals who possess skills in innovation and digital transformation are in high demand. Acquiring these skills can open up new career opportunities and increase earning potential.


Relevance: Staying current in a rapidly changing job market is essential. Learning about the latest trends and technologies ensures that experts remain relevant and marketable in their respective fields.


Entrepreneurship: For those interested in entrepreneurship, understanding digital transformation and innovation is critical for launching and scaling successful startups. These skills enable entrepreneurs to disrupt industries and create innovative solutions.


Problem-Solving: Innovation and digital transformation programs equip professionals with problem-solving skills that can be applied to a wide range of challenges in various industries. These problem-solving abilities are highly transferable and valuable.


Networking Opportunities: Participating in learning programs often leads to networking opportunities with peers, mentors, and industry leaders. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new career prospects and collaborations.


Personal Growth: Learning new skills and staying up-to-date with industry trends can be personally fulfilling. It can boost confidence and provide a sense of accomplishment, which in turn can enhance job satisfaction and overall well-being.


Learning programs in innovation and digital transformation are essential for both companies and experts. They enable organizations to thrive in a rapidly changing business environment and empower individuals to advance their careers, contribute to their organizations, and make a meaningful impact on their industries.


Mini MBA programs have gained significant popularity in recent years as a valuable educational option for both employers and experts seeking to enhance their careers or start their own businesses. These condensed, focused programs offer a taste of traditional MBA coursework without the time and financial commitments required by full-length MBA programs. Here's why Mini MBA programs are important for building careers and businesses:

1. Skill Enhancement: Mini MBA programs provide participants with a comprehensive understanding of key business principles, such as finance, marketing, strategy, and leadership. This knowledge equips individuals with the skills necessary to excel in their current roles or transition into new ones. Employers can benefit from employees who possess a broader skill set and can contribute more effectively to the organization's success.

2. Cost-Effective: Mini MBA programs are typically more affordable than full-length MBA programs, making them accessible to a wider range of professionals. This affordability allows individuals to invest in their education without incurring substantial debt, making it a viable option for those looking to advance their careers or start their own businesses.

3. Time Efficiency: Many professionals cannot commit to the two-year duration of a traditional MBA program due to work and personal commitments. Mini MBA programs are designed to be completed in a shorter time frame, often a few months, making it possible for individuals to balance their education with their existing responsibilities.

4. Networking Opportunities: Mini MBA programs often bring together a diverse group of professionals from various industries and backgrounds. This diversity fosters valuable networking opportunities, enabling participants to connect with peers, instructors, and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new career opportunities and potential business collaborations.

5. Entrepreneurial Skill Development: Mini MBA programs are particularly beneficial for aspiring entrepreneurs. They offer insights into business planning, finance, marketing, and strategy – all critical aspects of launching and running a successful business. Entrepreneurs can use the knowledge gained from a Mini MBA program to make informed decisions and navigate the complexities of entrepreneurship.

6. Adaptability and Continuous Learning: In today's rapidly changing business landscape, adaptability and continuous learning are essential. Mini MBA programs provide participants with up-to-date knowledge and skills that can help them stay relevant and competitive in their careers. Employers value employees who are committed to ongoing learning and development.

7. Career Advancement: For employees looking to advance within their organizations, a Mini MBA can be a valuable asset. It demonstrates a commitment to professional growth and can make individuals more competitive for promotions and leadership positions.

8. Confidence Building: Mini MBA programs can boost the confidence of both employees and aspiring entrepreneurs. Knowing that you have a solid foundation in business concepts and strategies can empower you to take on new challenges and seize opportunities.

Mini MBA programs offer a cost-effective, time-efficient, and comprehensive way for both employers and experts to enhance their skills, advance their careers, and build successful businesses. Whether you are seeking career growth within an organization or aiming to launch your own venture, a Mini MBA program can provide the knowledge and confidence needed to achieve your goals in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.longDescription:
This course teaches you how to make the 2d game snake with Python. You will learn to use the module pygame. pygame is a Python game development library designed for use with the The Python programming language. pygame is designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics as well as high level modules for tasks such as video playback.

The snake game is the most classic and influential arcade game in the video game universe, It is a video game classic that has been played by many players since its inception. It used to be on an arcade machine but these days is available even in phones.

pygame is a set of Python bindings for the SDL multimedia library. It works with a variety of operating systems and hardware platforms, including Linux with Raspberry Pi, Microsoft Windows, Apple Mac OS X, BeOS, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, Sharp Zaurus, iPAQ, HTC Dream phone and even Android.

General Python knowledge is required. We will use object orientated programming concepts and another module called random to generate random numbers for our game. While the course shouldn't be to difficult to grasp, knowledge of object orientated programming like classes and objects are recommended.

Upon completing this course you'll be able to make your own 2d games, have a working snake game and have basic game development skills. All source code is included with this course.
targetAudiences: Intermediate Python programmers

courseDetails.title: Mastering QuickBooks Online 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: From Novice to Expert: Comprehensive QuickBooks Online Mastery - Navigate, Analyze Transactions, and Optimize Usage
courseDetails.longDescription:
This exhaustive course is your ticket to expertise in QuickBooks Online, offering an immersive learning experience that caters to beginners and seasoned users alike.

The promise of mastering QuickBooks in just an hour might sound appealing, but we firmly believe in a robust and thorough exploration of this powerful software. This course is designed to guide learners from the very basics to an in-depth understanding of the platform, while offering the flexibility to reference specific topics as needed. It serves as a reliable, up-to-date reference guide that we commit to updating annually to reflect the latest developments in the software.

Starting from the ground up, we demonstrate how to access and install the QuickBooks software, potentially at no cost. Using a sample file provided by QuickBooks, learners will navigate the software, identify commonly-used areas, and comprehend the relationship between data input and the resultant financial statements and related reports.

The course utilizes a transactional analysis approach, categorizing transactions into accounting cycles: vendor cycle (alternatively known as payment, purchases, accounts payable, or expenses cycle), customer cycle (also referred to as revenue, sales, or accounts receivable cycle), and employee cycle. Each cycle's data input forms and their impact on financial statements and related reports are examined in detail.

The subsequent section involves setting up a new company file, a crucial learning step to grasp foundational accounting system components like the chart of accounts, service items, revenue items, and starting balances. Learners will practice entering a variety of common transactions over two months, backed by instructional videos, and analyze each transaction's impact on the financial statements and related reports.

Bank reconciliations, an essential part of financial integrity, are also covered, demonstrating reconciliation procedures using sample bank statements. Further, an extensive section devoted to bank feeds ensures learners understand how to connect to the bank, download and incorporate bank data into the accounting system, and apply bank rules for efficiency.

Following this, we delve into adjusting entries, used to align financial statement reports to their accounting basis at the month or year-end. Key accounting bases such as accrual, cash, or tax basis will be explored.

The course additionally covers budget construction best practices, QuickBooks budget entry, and budget report generation. Specialized topics such as account number usage, form customization, class tracking, transaction memorization, and multiple currency handling are also included, providing a well-rounded understanding of QuickBooks Online.

By the conclusion of this course, learners will have developed a comprehensive understanding and skill set to expertly navigate and utilize QuickBooks Online for all their accounting needs.
targetAudiences: Aspiring Accountants and Finance Students: Whether you're currently studying or planning to pursue a career in accounting or finance, this course will help you understand and navigate one of the industry's leading software tools.

Accounting Professionals: For those already in the field, this course serves as a valuable refresher or a chance to update your QuickBooks Online skills. It provides the latest information and can enhance your effectiveness at work.

Small Business Owners & Entrepreneurs: If you're managing your own business and want to handle your own accounts or better understand your financials, this course offers a comprehensive guide to using QuickBooks Online.

Freelancers and Self-Employed Individuals: Those who handle their own finances and need an efficient way to track their income and expenses will benefit from this in-depth exploration of QuickBooks Online.
Bookkeepers: If you are in charge of financial records for a business, this course will help you leverage QuickBooks Online to organize and manage those records effectively.

Consultants and Financial Advisors: Professionals who provide advice to businesses about their financial management processes will find this course beneficial for understanding one of the most used accounting platforms.

Anyone Interested in QuickBooks Online: Whether you're considering a career change, or just interested in understanding accounting software, this course provides a thorough understanding of QuickBooks Online.

Building the Web3 Token Balance App: A Comprehensive Workshop

The world of technology is constantly evolving, and with the rise of blockchain and decentralized applications, understanding Web3 has become essential for anyone looking to stay relevant and competitive in the tech industry. This course, "Building the Web3 Token Balance App," offers a comprehensive journey into the world of Web3 and blockchain development. Through hands-on projects and practical guidance, participants will gain a deep understanding of Web3 concepts and how to apply them to create a functional token balance app.


In this immersive workshop, you will learn how to build a token balance app that allows users to enter a wallet address and retrieve information about all the tokens held in that wallet, along with their respective balances. Moreover, you will learn how to fetch a detailed history of incoming and outgoing transfers for a specific token within a wallet. By the end of this course, you will not only have a functional Web3 application but also the skills and knowledge needed to explore further possibilities in blockchain development.

Web3 represents the future of the internet and offers exciting career opportunities. Understanding and mastering Web3 concepts can significantly enhance your career prospects. Here's why:


High Demand for Web3 Developers: As the adoption of blockchain technology and decentralized applications grows, there is a rising demand for developers who can build Web3 applications. Companies and startups in various industries are looking for talent with Web3 skills.

Decentralization and Security: Web3 applications operate on decentralized networks, making them more resistant to censorship and cyberattacks. Understanding Web3 technology can be crucial for building secure and resilient applications, which is a top priority for businesses and organizations.


Financial Opportunities: The blockchain industry has created new financial opportunities, including careers in cryptocurrency trading, token investment, and blockchain consulting. A solid understanding of Web3 is essential to navigate this space effectively.

courseDetails.shortDescription: 7-Step Proven System to convert every job interview into a job offer
courseDetails.longDescription:
Proven Interview System 3.0 - The #1 BEST-SELLING Job Interview Course! (with over 480 ratings)


>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED (Last updated: NOVEMBER 2023): NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER, AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 346,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


Preparing for an interview takes a lot more than Googling a list of common interview questions. You have to make a great first impression, you will have to have a great knowledge of your target company and its product, and, of course, know exactly how to convey that you're the perfect fit for the job.

There is no one “best” way to prepare for an interview. Rather, there are specific and important strategies to enhance one’s chances for interview success. Every interview is a learning experience. Learning that takes place during the preparation and actual interview process is useful for future interviews


The interview is one of the most important elements in the job search process. When an employer invites you to an interview, he/she is indicating an interest in bringing you on board. The interview gives both of you the opportunity to exchange enough information to determine if you are a good "fit" for each other.


The biggest mistake in interviewing is not being fully prepared. It behooves job-seekers to use every conceivable means possible to prepare for the interview and to allow ample time to fully prepare.


Understand that interviewing is a skill; as with all skills, preparation, and practice enhance the quality of that skill. Preparation can make the difference between getting an offer and getting rejected. You should use the limited amount of time you have to learn about an employer's needs and discuss the ways you can meet these needs.


Think of an interview as a highly focused professional conversation. In many cases, you will interview at least twice before being hired for a position. Once in a brief screening interview and at least once again in a more serious meeting when you may also speak with many of your potential co-workers.

courseDetails.title: Foreclosure Success for Real Estate Investors by Jay Conner
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to Create Win-Win in Foreclosures
courseDetails.longDescription:
Foreclosure is a legal process in which a lender attempts to recover the balance of a loan from a borrower who has stopped making payments to the lender by forcing the sale of the asset used as the collateral for the loan.

It creates a unique opportunity for real estate investors to acquire properties for a steep discount, while helping the owners get out of a tough situation.

In this fast paced course based on Jay's live presentations to a small group of dedicated real estate investors, you will discover:

  • What foreclosures are

  • How to find pre-foreclosures before your competition

  • How the foreclosures process works

  • Why it is a Win/Win/Win/Win situation

  • What to do with your foreclosure property after you close on it.

  • and much more...

President Joe Biden extended a federal moratorium on evictions and foreclosures in January, 2021. He also pushed for more aid to help struggling renters and homeowners pay their bills. That may provide some relief in the short term. But the new administration — like the one before it, and the one before that — faces a much longer-term affordability crisis.

“We have a huge shortage of housing for pretty much every income level except the very highest,” said David Dworkin, CEO of the National Housing Conference, which advocates for affordable housing.

The global pandemic shattered the world order and the US economy suffered its biggest blow since the Great Depression in the second quarter. The housing market too briefly hit pause in spring. Back in March of 2020, the real estate market looked to be headed into a steep decline due to widespread stay-home orders.

The pandemic has certainly affected every sector but residential real estate has been very resilient. The real estate sector has also been highly supportive of the economic recovery of the country so far. It has emerged as a pillar of support for the economy. 2020 was a record-breaking year for the US housing market. According to Zillow, in total, 5.64 million homes were sold in 2020, up 5.6% from 2019.

The typical U.S. home was worth $266,104 in December, up 8.4% (or $20,587) from a year ago. House prices in all the major markets continue to rise. According to economists and market watchers, home values are growing at their fastest pace in a generation, and are showing no signs of slowing down in 2021.

But behind all this are disturbing trends in Forbearance. the precursor to Foreclosure.

Seriously delinquent mortgages are up 1.7 million in 2020 to 2.1 million. Rental payments are in arrears, which means landlords can't pay their mortgages, as 40% of renters say they cannot make their rent.

There is a huge opportunity in real estate coming.

Enrol today!
targetAudiences: Real estate investors

For Experts:

Such a certification demonstrates their commitment to continuous learning and career growth, making them stand out as highly skilled and reliable contributors.


Certified executive assistants are better equipped to tackle the complexities of the role, enhancing their ability to handle high-pressure situations, manage conflicting priorities, and excel in multitasking. Their certification reflects their dedication to maintaining confidentiality, which is a cornerstone of their role, ensuring the trust of executives and stakeholders alike. This recognition also fosters a sense of pride and self-assurance, boosting their confidence in approaching new challenges and providing strategic support.


For Companies:

Hiring certified professionals assures them of a candidate's competency in essential areas, saving time and resources on training. These certified individuals bring enhanced problem-solving abilities, adaptability to change, and a holistic view of business operations, thereby contributing to the organization's overall success.


Certified executive assistants also significantly enhance the company's reputation. Their proficiency in maintaining confidentiality safeguards sensitive information, mitigating the risks of data breaches. Importantly, certified executive assistants act as catalysts for the growth of the executives they support. By efficiently handling administrative tasks, they free up executive time for strategic decision-making and value-added activities. This alignment of efforts results in improved leadership effectiveness and organizational outcomes.


The Benefits of Executive Assistance as a Career:

The realm of executive assistance offers a diverse array of responsibilities that facilitate professional growth. From managing schedules and travel arrangements to playing a vital role in project management, executive assistants have the opportunity to become indispensable members of the team. This career path fosters an environment of continuous learning, as technology, business dynamics, and communication tools evolve.


Moreover, a career as an executive assistant opens doors to various industries and sectors, allowing professionals to build versatile skill sets and expand their knowledge. The Executive Assistant Professional Certification holds immense significance for both professionals and companies. courseDetails.title: GMAT Focus Prep | Quant | Master Math Course | 2023 Updated
courseDetails.shortDescription: Shortcuts & tricks for calculation | GMAT Focus Edition | Problem solving & Data suff| 4 Grand Tests | 10 mini test
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock Your GMAT Math Success with Our Comprehensive Course!

Are you a GMAT beginner aiming for a solid math foundation, or an advanced student seeking to conquer expert-level questions and concepts? Look no further! Our GMAT Math course is meticulously crafted to cater to learners of all levels, ensuring that everyone can master GMAT math, regardless of how long it's been since you last tackled math.

This course is your key to GMAT Quantitative excellence, and here's why:

  1. Comprehensive Coverage: Our course is the result of years of instructor experience and covers every topic you'll encounter on the GMAT. We've scoured various GMAT resources to ensure you're fully prepared.

  2. Calculator-Free Skills: Since GMAT doesn't allow calculators, we've placed special emphasis on sharpening your mental math skills and equipping you with time-saving shortcuts. Say goodbye to relying on calculators forever!

  3. Regular Updates: This course isn't static. We continually update it, adding new topics and addressing any areas that need further explanation. Your learning journey is our top priority.

  4. Student-Centric Learning: Your input matters! We encourage students to share topics they'd like to explore further, and we incorporate these requests into the course. This is your course, tailored to your needs.

  5. Advanced-Level Practice: For those looking for an extra challenge, we provide four full-length tests, thoroughly solved. These tests cover nearly every type of word problem you might encounter on the GMAT. More tests are in the pipeline!

  6. Geometry Optional: With the new GMAT focus, geometry is no longer a part of the test. However, we've kept our geometry sections in the course as optional content. They might come in handy for other test preparations.

  7. Quadratics Bonus: For absolute beginners, we've included a bonus section at the end of the course that introduces you to quadratics from the ground up. This section is perfect for those who need a refresher or are entirely new to the topic.

By completing this course, you'll be ready to tackle almost every GMAT Quantitative question with confidence. Join us today and set yourself on the path to GMAT success!
targetAudiences: All prospective MBA students who want to join top-notch international business universities

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y ChatGPT Desde Cero
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web desde cero con WordPress y ChatGPT, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS Y CHATGPT PARA AUMENTAR LAS VENTAS DE TU NEGOCIO?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


ChatGPT es un sistema de chat basado en el modelo de lenguaje por Inteligencia Artificial GPT-3, desarrollado por la empresa OpenAI. Es un modelo con más de 175 millones de parámetros, y entrenado con grandes cantidades de texto para realizar tareas relacionadas con el lenguaje, desde la traducción hasta la generación de texto.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web con WordPress,  también utilizaremos la plataforma de ChatGPT que nos brindará el apoyo y la información necesaria para diseñar nuestro sitio web en WordPress, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress y ChatGPT, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress y ChatGPT.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress y ChatGPT desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional con la ayuda de ChatGPT.

  • Cómo crear el contenido de tu sitio web con la ayuda de ChatGPT.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu sitio web.

  • Cómo adaptar tu sitio web para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y ChatGPT Desde Cero", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 175,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress y ChatGPT de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con WordPress y ChatGPT.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship, Startup, MBA Business Module, Growth
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship


Program provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on higher & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 199 countries and has been chosen by more than 140,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship is a program designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills, strategies, and visionary thinking required to navigate the intricate world of modern corporate entrepreneurship. This course offers a deep exploration of the dynamic landscape of corporate innovation and entrepreneurship, covering an  array of topics that are crucial for individuals aiming to spearhead innovation, drive growth, and foster entrepreneurial cultures within established organizations.


Course Outline:

Understanding Modern Corporate Entrepreneurship:

The Role of Innovation: Analyzing the central role of innovation as the driving force behind corporate entrepreneurship and market disruption. Distinguishing Entrepreneurship from Intrapreneurship.

Comparative Analysis: Differentiating between external entrepreneurship and internal intrapreneurship, emphasizing their distinct attributes and applications.

Real-world Case Studies: Exploring diverse examples of both entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship to showcase their practical implications.


Exploring Intrapreneurship Types and Case Studies:

Categories of Intrapreneurial Endeavors: Investigating various forms of intrapreneurship, including product innovation and process enhancement.

Intrapreneurship Success Stories: Examining case studies of successful intrapreneurial initiatives within renowned organizations across industries.


Challenges of Cultivating Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Identifying Obstacles: Analyzing the inherent challenges that organizations face when attempting to foster a culture of corporate entrepreneurship.

Strategies for Overcoming Challenges: Developing proactive strategies to address resistance to change, risk aversion, and organizational inertia.


Taxonomy of Intrapreneurial Personalities:

Intrapreneurial Archetypes: Defining different profiles of intrapreneurs, including idea generators, project champions, and disruptive catalysts.

Nurturing Intrapreneurial Talent: Strategies for recognizing and nurturing individuals with intrapreneurial potential within the workforce.


Nurturing and Leading Intrapreneurs:

Fostering a Supportive Ecosystem: Creating an environment that encourages creativity, experimentation, and calculated risk-taking.

Empowerment Strategies: Providing intrapreneurs with resources, autonomy, and mentorship to propel their innovative endeavors.


Becoming an Intrapreneurial Leader:

Personal Transformation: Cultivating the mindset and skillset necessary for individuals to lead with intrapreneurial spirit within their roles.

Influence and Impact: Strategies for inspiring teams, driving change, and championing innovation from within.


Diverse Models of Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Frameworks for Integration: Exploring a spectrum of models and frameworks organizations can adopt to infuse entrepreneurial principles into their DNA.

Case Studies: Analyzing the practical implementation of various models in successful corporate entrepreneurship initiatives.


Unlocking Growth with Strategic Innovation:

Growth Hacking Strategies: Delving into the innovative techniques and agile approaches that drive rapid business expansion.

Engines of Growth: Investigating the mechanisms that fuel accelerated growth in startups and established enterprises.

Market Expansion Theories and Growth Matrices:


Market Penetration vs. Expansion:

Exploring market expansion theories and their pivotal role in strategic decision-making for growth.

Growth Matrix Applications: Applying growth matrices to identify growth opportunities, allocate resources, and diversify product portfolios.


Corporate Venturing and Innovation Ecosystems:

Corporate Venturing Strategies: Understanding the concept of corporate venturing and its impact on driving innovation through external partnerships.

Navigating Innovation Ecosystems: Examining how organizations can collaborate with startups, academia, and research centers to fuel innovation.


Importance for Companies and Employees:

The landscape of modern business is marked by rapid technological advancements, evolving customer preferences, and dynamic competitive pressures. In such an environment, corporate entrepreneurship stands as a beacon of resilience and adaptability for organizations. The Comprehensive Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence serves as a critical learning pathway for companies seeking to stay at the forefront of innovation and leverage entrepreneurial agility to secure sustainable growth.


For Companies:

Cultivating Innovation Culture: The course equips companies with the tools and methodologies to foster an innovation-driven culture, enabling them to stay ahead of disruption and drive continuous improvement.

Seizing New Opportunities: Organizations that embrace corporate entrepreneurship are better positioned to identify emerging market trends, seize untapped opportunities, and create innovative solutions that resonate with customers.

Navigating Disruption: The skills gained from this course empower companies to navigate disruptive forces by fostering an agile mindset, encouraging creative problem-solving, and capitalizing on change.


For Employees:

Career Acceleration: Individuals equipped with corporate entrepreneurship skills become invaluable assets to their organizations. They are poised to take on leadership roles, drive strategic initiatives, and contribute significantly to their companies' growth trajectories.

Entrepreneurial Skillset: Learning the art of corporate entrepreneurship imparts a versatile skillset that transcends job titles. Professionals gain the ability to identify market gaps, propose innovative solutions, and drive change even from within established hierarchies.

Personal Branding: Embracing corporate entrepreneurship fosters a reputation for being a proactive, innovative, and dynamic professional. This can open doors to exciting career opportunities and help individuals stand out in competitive job markets.


Leveraging Corporate Entrepreneurship for Career and Business Ventures:

The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship  not only equips individuals with skills to thrive within organizations but also empowers them to embark on entrepreneurial journeys of their own.


Career Advancement: Professionals who demonstrate a keen understanding of corporate entrepreneurship principles are more likely to be considered for leadership positions. Their ability to drive innovation and adapt to changing business landscapes makes them indispensable assets to any organization.


Entrepreneurial Endeavors: Armed with the mindset and skillset of corporate entrepreneurship, individuals are well-equipped to transition from being employees to becoming successful entrepreneurs. The course nurtures the spirit of calculated risk-taking, resource optimization, and strategic thinking – all essential components for entrepreneurial success.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence offers a transformative learning experience that bridges the gap between traditional business approaches and the demands of a rapidly evolving market. It empowers companies to become innovation powerhouses and individuals to carve out exceptional career trajectories or entrepreneurial journeys. Enroll in this program to embark on a transformative journey that merges innovation, leadership, and business acumen into a potent catalyst for growth and success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at management, corporate management, corporate culture, business and for everyone who wants to improve skills and knowledge at management.

courseDetails.title: Mastering QuickBooks Desktop 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: QuickBooks Desktop Mastery: From Setup to Transactions, Reconciliations & Advanced Features - Comprehensive Guide
courseDetails.longDescription:
Disregard any notion of becoming a QuickBooks expert in an hour. True proficiency takes time and comprehensive learning, which this course is designed to provide. Catering to both beginners and experienced users, our course initiates with the basics and progresses to in-depth software analysis.

This course is structured to enable learners to follow a start-to-finish path or jump directly to relevant sections. Serving as a dependable, up-to-date reference guide, it is ideal for ongoing consultation. We remain committed to course updates to ensure continued relevance and usefulness.

We understand that software-focused courses can become outdated swiftly, which is why we are dedicated to updating the material regularly. Additionally, we include lectures relevant to prior software versions, useful for those utilizing older QuickBooks versions.

This course provides backup files, an invaluable tool for learners wishing to progress ahead or revisit specific sections. These files ensure learners have identical data to the examples provided, facilitating an easy, step-by-step following of the presentation and task execution.

The course begins with accessing, downloading, and installing the QuickBooks software, potentially free of charge. Using a sample file provided by QuickBooks, learners will explore the software, identify frequently-used areas, and understand the correlation between data input and the generation of financial statements and related reports.

Our transaction analysis by accounting cycle – vendor, customer, and employee – enables learners to appreciate the flow of data input forms in each cycle and their consequent impact on financial statements and related reports.

A critical course component is the creation of a new company file, a vital step in understanding the setup of fundamental accounting system elements such as chart of accounts, service items, revenue items, and starting balances. Learners will practice data input for two months, using a variety of common transactions, supported by instructional videos, and evaluate each transaction's impact on financial statements and related reports.

Upon completion of data input, learners will carry out bank reconciliations using sample bank statements, mastering the procedure and understanding the reasoning behind it. An expansive section on bank feeds demonstrates how to connect to the bank, download bank data into QuickBooks, create or verify financial transactions, and apply bank rules for efficiency. Data input using bank feeds for checking, credit card, and PayPal accounts will also be demonstrated.

Subsequently, learners will enter adjusting entries, used to align financial statement reports to their accounting basis at the month or year-end. Various accounting bases such as accrual, cash, and tax will be examined.

The course provides an understanding of the role of budgets in the accounting process, best practices for budget construction, QuickBooks budget entry, and generation of budget reports.

Additionally, specialized topics such as account number usage, form customization, class tracking, transaction memorization, fixed asset tracking, tax mapping, and multiple currency handling are included, offering a rounded understanding of QuickBooks Desktop.

Upon completion of this course, learners will have cultivated a comprehensive skill set, enabling proficient navigation and utilization of QuickBooks Desktop for all their accounting needs.
targetAudiences: Aspiring Accountants and Finance Students: If you're studying or planning to pursue a career in accounting or finance, this course will help you become proficient in one of the industry's leading software tools.
Accounting Professionals: For those already working in the field, this course serves as a comprehensive refresher or a chance to update your QuickBooks Desktop skills.

Small Business Owners & Entrepreneurs: If you're running your own business and want to manage your own accounts or gain a better understanding of your financials, this course will serve as a detailed guide to using QuickBooks Desktop.

Freelancers and Self-Employed Individuals: Those handling their own finances and needing an effective way to track their income and expenses will benefit from this course's extensive exploration of QuickBooks Desktop.
Bookkeepers: This course is beneficial for bookkeepers in charge of financial records, helping them organize and manage these records more effectively using QuickBooks Desktop.

Consultants and Financial Advisors: If you provide businesses with financial management advice, this course can enhance your understanding of one of the most popular accounting platforms, thereby improving your consultancy services.

Any Individual Interested in QuickBooks Desktop: Whether you're considering a career change or are simply curious about understanding accounting software, this course offers an exhaustive understanding of QuickBooks Desktop.

courseDetails.shortDescription: basic terminology and concepts related to the area of tax law
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you find yourself stuck when reading a legal text on tax law due to the language used? Are you confused or feel lost when listening to native English speakers discuss a tax issue due to the complexity of the terminology?

This course is intended for anyone either studying or working in some capacity in the field of tax law (and particularly for non-native English speakers). It introduces students (or provides a good review for those already with some knowledge) to key vocabulary, concepts, collocations and prepositions in the area of tax law. It can also be a good introduction to the world of tax law for those with no background  in that field whatsoever.

The focus of the course is on key terminology, collocations, prepositions and reading/listening comprehension based on current global tax issues.  By the end of the course, you should have the basics of the language of tax law to be able to understand and communicate with others smoothly and accurately.

You will learn key terminology related to both personal taxation; corporate taxation; VAT or GST terminology; audit terminology, etc. You will perfect your reading comprehension skills based on a VAT related reading based on the UK Tax Code. Similarly, you will also perfect your listening / video comprehension skills based on two videos dealing with current global controversial tax issues: the first one relating to Amazon's corporate taxation issues and the second related to Apple's corporate taxation battle with the European Union.

This mini course is not intended to go in-depth into any of the above mentioned tax related areas and issues, but rather, provide you with the very basics to be able to speak, read and understand content related to basic tax.

The approach is rather practical with an introductory session of approx. 80 minutes accompanied by a pdf script of everything said in the video along with key exercises in order to put the theory into practice. All the materials mentioned in the video are attached as resources in each of the 5 Lectures.

Feel also free to leave your comments and thoughts related to the tax issues raised in the course, particularly in the two video comprehension excercises on the course forum.
targetAudiences: The course is intended for both business and legal professionals as well as university or college students seeking to expand or check their knowledge in the area of basic tax
